en: Peppa is playing with her doll's house. George is playing, too.
zh: 佩奇在玩她的玩偶小屋。乔治也在玩。

en: Peppa is making a tea party for the doll family.
zh: 佩奇在给玩偶之家开茶会。

en: Here, George! I'm the Mummy and Daddy.
zh: 来吧，乔治！我来扮演妈妈和爸爸。

en: You can be the children.
Children! It's nearly tea time, so you must wash your hands.
zh: 孩子们！下午茶时间快到了，你们必须得洗手。

en: George's putting the dolls to bed.
Night night!
George, why are you putting the children to bed?
zh: 乔治，你为什么把孩子们放在床上？

en: They're having a tea party.
George likes putting the dolls to bed.
zh: 乔治喜欢把玩偶放在床上。

en: Children, come down stairs right now or you won't get any cake!
zh: 孩子们，快下来，不然你们吃不到蛋糕了！

en: George isn't listening.
He's too busy putting the dolls to bed.
zh: 他在忙着把玩偶放到床上。

en: George! If you want to play with my doll's house, you have to help with the tea party.
zh: 乔治！如果你想玩我的玩偶小屋，你得帮忙办茶会。

en: Here, George, you can fill the teapot with water.
zh: 来吧，乔治，你去把茶壶装满。

en: Children, come downstairs right now.
zh: 孩子们，现在马上下楼吧。

en: Mummy! We're coming!
George is going to fill the teapot with water.
zh: 乔治准备把茶壶装满水。

en: George has found a spider in the sink.
zh: 乔治在水槽里发现了一只蜘蛛。

en: George wants the spider to be his friend.
zh: 乔治想蜘蛛成为他的朋友。

en: George likes the spider.
The spider likes George.
Peppa loves playing tea parties.
Where are all the chocolate biscuits, Daddy?
zh: 所有的巧克力饼干在哪啊，爸爸？

en: We had lots yesterday!
Oh, err, I'm sorry, Mummy,I must have eaten them all.
zh: 哦，呃，对不起，妈妈，我已经吃完了。

en: Naughty Daddy.
George is putting the spider to bed.
Night night.
George, what is it you're doing?
You have to help me with the tea party.
Help, help!
Daddy! There's a spider in my bedroom!!
zh: 爸爸！有只蜘蛛在我的卧室！！

en: Don't worry, Peppa.
Please, Daddy, take it away.
No need to panic.
Hello, George, have you seen the spider?
zh: 你好，乔治，你有没有看到蛛蛛？

en: It's too scary. Take it away.
There's no need to be afraid, Peppa.
zh: 没有必要这么害怕，佩奇。

en: Spiders are very, very small and they can't hurt you.
zh: 蛛蛛是非常非常小的他们不会伤害你。

en: But don't worry，
Daddy will take it out of the bedroom.
Woah! He's quite big, isn't he?
zh: 哦啊！他长得挺大的，是不是？

en: Umm...I'll just fetch Mummy Pig.
Mummy Pig!
Hello, Mr. Skinnylegs.
Peppa feels a little bit braver.
He likes being in my doll's house.
zh: 他喜欢在我的玩偶小屋。

en: Hello, children,
I hear you've found a little spider.
zh: 我听说你们发现了一只小蜘蛛。

en: I'll take him out of the bedroom so you two can play.
zh: 我会把它拿出卧室，你俩就可以继续玩了。

en: Mummy, his name is Mr. Skinnylegs.
zh: 妈妈，他的名字叫瘦腿先生。

en: Oh! Mr. Skinnylegs is big, isn't he?
zh: 哦！瘦腿先生很大，是不是？

en: Peppa and George like the spider.
zh: 佩奇和和乔治喜欢这蜘蛛。

en: Night night.
George is putting the spider to bed.
No, George!
He wants some tea.
He doesn't want to be in bed.
Are you hungry, Mr. Skinnylegs?
Would you like some cake?
Peppa isn't afraid of the spider anymore.
Mummy, Daddy. Sit down.
We're all going to have tea with Mr. Skinnylegs.
zh: 我们准备和瘦腿先生一起用茶。

en: Who wants tea?
Me, please! Me, please!
Delicious!
Peppa loves playing tea parties.
Here's your tea, Mr. Skinnylegs.
What's that?
You want to say ''hello'' to my daddy?
Hello, Mr. Daddy Pig!
Heh, err, that's all right, Peppa.
Let Mr. Skinnylegs drink his tea.
You're not scared, are you, Daddy?
zh: 你不会害怕的，对不对，爸爸？

en: Oh, no, of course not.
Not so close.
Peppa likes Mr. Skinnylegs,
Everyone likes Mr. Skinnylegs.
